builderConditions.HCRA_DESCRIPTION:
You have not fulfilled the requirements under the Builder Education Program, which was one of the conditions placed on your registration in the previous year.  
You must provide proof of registration within the next THIRTY (30) days for each of the courses listed below:

1) Business Planning and Management
2) Financial Planning and Management
3) Project Management and Supervision
4) Legal Issues in Housing
5) Customer Service / Tarion Requirements 

Once you have provided proof of registration within 30 days, you are required to show proof of successful completion of these courses within the next SIX (6) months.  

Failure to provide proof of successful completion within the next SIX (6) months will result in the Registrar increasing security requirements, reducing enrolment limits and/or issuing a Notice of Proposal to revoke your registration.
